price: ফিৰআউনে ক’লে, ‘হয়, আৰু নিশ্চয় তোমালোক তেতিয়া মোৰ ঘনিষ্টসকলৰ অন্তৰ্ভুক্ত হ’বা’।
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
